titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of Defense should consider establishing an award program for the cyber community of the Department of Defense.
A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of Defense should consider establishing an award program for the cyber community of the Department of Defense.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Department of Defense (DOD) should consider establishing an award program for its employees who carry out DOD cyber missions or functions.
